==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|''{{w|Mount Damavand}}''|fa=دماوند}} is a dormant stratovolcano, the highest peak in Iran and Western Asia and the highest volcano in Asia and the 3rd highest volcano in the Eastern Hemisphere. Damāvand has a special place in Persian mythology and folklore.
*In-universe lore states that in the lost language of the desert dwellers Mt. Damavand means "the mountain from which smoke and ash arise."<ref>{{Ref/Loading|Sumeru|Mt. Damavand}}</ref>
